backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, leadership word submissions, activity submissions, and access control–protected query and update methods.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records mapping feature IDs to related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Plain-text mapping of frontend file paths to short human-written descriptions of their functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, light/dark mode tokens, and base style resets.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document with a root div and script loading the React entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and React Query client, rendering the app within AppShell.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout shell with header, navigation, auth handling, and mobile menu support.
frontend/src/components/LeadershipWordPa: Component displaying top leadership words with optional polling via React Query.
frontend/src/components/MicroSolutionsCo: Displays a list of community micro‑solutions with optional polling and handles loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/PageSection.tsx: Provides a styled section wrapper with configurable class names for page layout.
frontend/src/components/SignInGate.tsx: Shows a sign‑in prompt using Internet Identity when the user is not authenticated and otherwise renders children.
frontend/src/content/movieReferences.ts: Exports an array of movie and film‑series reference strings used for citations.
frontend/src/content/proposalContent.ts: Defines structured proposal metadata, including title, author, bio, abstracts, and learning outcomes.
frontend/src/content/references.ts: Exports a typed list of academic reference entries with stable keys for citation use.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, providing identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and submitting leadership words and resilient leadership activities, including optimistic updates and polling options.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app root and wraps it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/ActivitiesPage.tsx: Displays an overview of two interactive activities with descriptions and navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/Activity1LeadershipWo: Implements the UI and logic for submitting a leadership word, generating affirmations, and fetching related quotes.
frontend/src/pages/Activity2ResilientLea: Handles resilient leadership activity submissions, validation generation, and quote retrieval.
frontend/src/pages/BioPage.tsx: Shows the author's bio, organization details, and social links.
frontend/src/pages/LeadershipBoardPage.t: Displays community leadership word trends and shared micro‑solutions with live polling.
Renders a page showing learning outcomes pulled from proposalContent, displayed in styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/MovieReferencesPage.t: Displays a list of inspirational movie references from movieReferences with simple styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/OverviewPage.tsx: Provides a hero banner, abstract sections, and quick navigation links using proposalContent data.
frontend/src/pages/ReferencesPage.tsx: Shows academic references from REFERENCES in a styled list layout.
frontend/src/pages/SessionOutlinePage.ts: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/TakeawaysPage.tsx: Displays key takeaways from proposalContent with titles and descriptions in styled sections.
frontend/src/utils/activity1Affirmations: Generates affirmation messages and selects academic references based on leadership-related user inputs.
frontend/src/utils/activity2Validation.t: Detects themes from user text, generates validation messages, and selects references accordingly.
Maps UI challenge type keys to backend ChallengeType enum values.
frontend/src/utils/isVillainousInput.ts: Detects negative or harmful language using keyword and phrase matching utilities.
frontend/src/utils/quoteFormatting.ts: Converts backend QuoteGenre enum values to readable franchise names.
frontend/src/utils/referenceSelection.ts: Validates references and selects deterministically or randomly from valid academic references.
frontend/src/utils/starWarsQuotes.ts: Provides a typed list of Star Wars quotes and a deterministic selector function based on a numeric seed.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based query cleanup.
frontend/src/utils/userFacingError.ts: Converts unknown or technical errors into friendly user-facing messages with special handling for common cases.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, fonts, containers, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, including versions, requirements, existing features, and pending requests.
